citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
All records required to be kept under the AWA standards could not be located at the time of the inspection. This includes
the animal inventory, animal acquisition and disposition records, the contingency plan, the program of veterinary care and
the bird enrichment plan. These records are essential for APHIS inspectors to complete a through review of the humane
care of animals at the facility. Please have all records available for inspections of the facility.
Correct by: Correct from this time forward 4/4/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
All records required to be kept under the AWA standards could not be located at the time of the inspection. This includes 
the animal inventory, animal acquisition and disposition records, the contingency plan, the program of veterinary care and 
the bird enrichment plan. These records are essential for APHIS inspectors to complete a through review of the humane 
care of animals at the facility. Please have all records available for inspections of the facility. 
Correct by: Correct from this time forward 4/4/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
